resources.string: Hello Pollfish! This Activity demonstrates how you can use Pollfish in your app. Please note, that this activity is recreated on each orientation change
Incentivize Activity. This Activity demonstrates how you can incentivize your users to complete a survey
Orientations Activity. This Activity demonstrates how you will hide/adjust Pollfish when your activity is not recreated on orientation change
Win 200 coins by completing a survey
Unfortunately you were not eligible, you still get 50 coins
Pollfish is only shown in Portrait mode, except in tablets
Pollfish Survey Completed - Congratulations, you have won 200 coins!
